docs.text: bayseian-filters-smoothers A unified library for Bayesian filter and smoother algorithms based on the book "Bayesian Filtering and Smoothing" - Simo Sarkka Purpose of the Package To provide a collection of all the Bayesian Filters and Smoothers in a unified framework To be a building block for Bayesian Inference of state-space models To provide building blocks for state estimation algorithms To provide building blocks for parameter estimation algorithms Features Kalman Filter/Smoother Extended Kalman Filter/Smoother Unscented Kalman Filter/Smoother Gaussian Filter/Smoother Particle Filter/Smoother Getting Started The package can be found on pypi hence you can install it using pip Installation pip install bayesian-filters-smoothers Contribution Contributions are welcome. Notice a bug let us know. Thanks! Author Ninad Kiran Gaikwad

docs.text: API Reference This page gives an overview of all the Bayesian Filters and Smoothers implemented in the package KF KS EKF EKS UKF UKS GF GS PF PS KF Kalman Filter is the simplest Bayesian Filter for a linear system
